Package Presentation.Controllers

Class PlaylistController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.Controllers.PlaylistController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
public class PlaylistController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
Class in charge of everything related to the controller of the Playlist linked to its own view. The methods shown below are in charge of the interactions with most of the components present in its correspondent view

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PlaylistController​(PlaylistView plv, PlaylistSongView plsv, CardView cv, PlayModel pm, UserModel um, SongModel sm)
    Constructor that initializes all of the variables previously declared.

  • Method Summary

    Method in charge of dealing with the button interactions in which the user interacts with while using of the program
    void changeTrack​(java.lang.String id, boolean next)
    Method in charge of allowing the user to play other tracks and change between them whenever feels like
    Playlist getPlaylist​(int id)
    Method in charge of getting the playlist of our interest
    int getPlaylistSize​(int id)
    Method in charge of getting the number of songs that a playlist contains
    java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> getPrivatePlaylists()
    Method in charge of acting as getter of the private playlists containing its own music tracks
    java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> getPublicPlaylists()
    Method in charge of acting as getter of the public playlists containing its own music tracks
    Song getSong​(int id)
    Method in charge of getting a specific song from a playlist

    Method in charge of getting all the songs of a playlist
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSongsList​(int id)
    Method in charge of getting the ids of the list of music tracks inside a playlist
    void randomTrack()
    Method that allows us to forward next to any other song from the playlist randomly, taking into the account the possibility that there may not be a track detected by the index

    Method in charge of adjusting the volume slider from the playlist song menu

  • Constructor Details

    • PlaylistController

      public PlaylistController​(PlaylistView plv, PlaylistSongView plsv, CardView cv, PlayModel pm, UserModel um, SongModel sm)
      Constructor that initializes all of the variables previously declared.
      Parameters:
      plv - PlaylistView in which allows the program to display the Playlist library screen
      plsv - PlaylistSongView in which allows the program to display the Song list subscreen from the Library screen
      cv - CardView in which allows us to list all of the screens pertaining to the project and switch between them whenever we feel like as the program's user

  • Method Details

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Method in charge of dealing with the button interactions in which the user interacts with while using of the program
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - ActionEvent default variable used to get the action/interaction coming from our keyboard

    • changeTrack

      public void changeTrack​(java.lang.String id, boolean next)
      Method in charge of allowing the user to play other tracks and change between them whenever feels like
      Parameters:
      id - String that represents the id of the song
      next - boolean that represents whether we can go or not to the next song to listen to

    • randomTrack

      public void randomTrack()
      Method that allows us to forward next to any other song from the playlist randomly, taking into the account the possibility that there may not be a track detected by the index

    • stateChanged

      public void stateChanged​(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent e)
      Method in charge of adjusting the volume slider from the playlist song menu
      Specified by:
      stateChanged in interface javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
      Parameters:
      e - for the ChangeEvent

      public java.util.ArrayList<Playlist> getPublicPlaylists()
      Method in charge of acting as getter of the public playlists containing its own music tracks
      Returns:
      ArrayList of playlists

      Method in charge of acting as getter of the private playlists containing its own music tracks

      ArrayList of playlists

      Method in charge of getting the number of songs that a playlist contains
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the specific playlist's number of tracks

      Returns:
      Playlist of our interest

    • getSongsList

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSongsList​(int id)
      Method in charge of getting the ids of the list of music tracks inside a playlist
      Parameters:
      id - int id of the playlist to extract the music tracks from
      Returns:
      ArrayList of ids of the songs

    • getSongs

      public java.util.ArrayList<Song> getSongs​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> id)
      Method in charge of getting all the songs of a playlist
      Parameters:
      id - ArrayList of the playlist that contains all of the songs
      Returns:
      All the songs

      Parameters:

      Returns:
